definitions.definition: activity requiring physical effort, carried out especially to sustain or improve health and fitness.
examples: exercise improves your heart and lung power
synonyms: calisthenics; informalphys ed; humoroussexercise "exercise improves your heart"

definitions.definition: a task or activity done to practice or test a skill.
examples: there are exercises at the end of each chapter to check comprehension

definitions.definition: a process or activity carried out for a specific purpose, especially one concerned with a specified area or skill.
a military drill or training maneuver.
examples: maneuvers, operations; war games military exercises

definitions.definition: the use or application of a faculty, right, or process.
use or apply (a faculty, right, or process).
examples: control is exercised by the Board
synonyms: apply "he must learn to exercise patience"

definitions.definition: engage in physical activity to sustain or improve health and fitness; take exercise.
synonyms: train; informalpump iron "she exercised every day"

definitions.definition: exert (part of the body) to promote or improve muscular strength.
examples: raise your knee to exercise the upper leg and hip muscles

definitions.definition: cause (an animal) to engage in exercise.
examples: she exercised her dogs before breakfast

definitions.definition: occupy the thoughts of; worry or perplex.
examples: the knowledge that a larger margin was possible still exercised him
